alert.note: Alert for Dewey; Hughes; Potter; Stanley; Sully; Walworth (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 12:34AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Sully, western Potter, northwestern Stanley, eastern Dewey, northwestern Hughes and southwestern Walworth Counties through 200 AM CDT/100 AM MDT/... At 134 AM CDT/1234 AM MDT/, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mission Ridge to 6 miles west of Fort Pierre. Movement was north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mission Ridge around 1240 AM MDT. Southern Lake Oahe around 1245 AM MDT. Spring Creek Rec Area, Cow Creek Rec Area and Okobojo Point Rec Area around 150 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Bush`S Landing and Ridgeview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dewey; Hughes; Potter; Stanley; Sully; Walworth
